title: Thousand Needles In Red - Empires | 320kbs
description:
Thousand Needles In Red - Empires (2011) EP; 320kbs

Clint Boge (The Butterfly Effect) returns to his heavier roots with this album. Fans of The Butterfly Effect will find much of this bands work to sound very familiar.

Ripped using EAC and LAME.

Album Length - 46:23
Album Year - 2011
Album Genre - Alternative Metal
